title: Postlyy: Your Content, Planned, Analyzed & Supercharged.
introduction: Postlyy is an all-in-one platform designed to help content creators and businesses create, schedule, and analyze content on X (Twitter) and LinkedIn. It offers intuitive creation tools, streamlined scheduling, and deep analytics to maximize creative potential and efficiency.
features: Create Recurring & Evergreen LinkedIn & Twitter Posts
Text to Image Converter (Pro and Expert plans)
targetPeople: Content creators, businesses, and enterprises looking to manage and analyze their social media content efficiently.

faqs.question: What is included in the Basic plan?
faqs.answer: The Basic plan includes scheduling X (Twitter) and LinkedIn posts, creating recurring and evergreen posts, calendar management, custom dashboard and content analytics, and a complimentary manager overview with 5+ seats.

faqs.question: What additional features are available in the Pro plan?
faqs.answer: The Pro plan includes all features of the Basic plan plus a text to image converter.

faqs.question: What additional features are available in the Expert plan?
faqs.answer: The Expert plan includes all features of the Pro plan plus AI content generation.

faqs.question: How does the complimentary manager seat work?
faqs.answer: For every 5 seats, you get 1 free complimentary manager seat. Additional manager seats can be purchased at $29.99 a month.

faqs.question: How does the subscription renewal work?
faqs.answer: Subscriptions renew automatically at the end of each billing cycle unless duly terminated, at which point the credit card on your account will be charged.
